DOC.HEADLINE: CARL MILLETAIRE ; VETERAN CHARACTER_ACTOR
DOC.TEXT: Carl Milletaire , 69 , character_actor for four decades usually cast as a heavy.Often playing a Mafioso or thug , Milletaire was best remembered as Frank Nitti ' s right-hand_man in the 1960s television series " The Untouchables. " He began his film career in 1950 and appeared in " Black_Hand , " " The Great Caruso , " " Young_Man With Ideas , " The Miracle of Our Lady of Fatima " and " Inside the Mafia " among others . On May 4 in New York of Parkinson ' s disease .
